All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ColorTools
Contains code for manipulating colors as int and packed float values in the CIE L*A*B* color space.
ColorTools
Contains code for manipulating colors as int and packed float values in the HSLuv color space.
ColorTools
Contains code for manipulating colors as int and packed float values in the IPT color space.
ColorTools
Contains code for manipulating colors as int and packed float values in the IPT color space.
ColorTools
Contains code for manipulating colors as int and packed float values in the Oklab color space.
ColorTools
Contains code for manipulating colors as int and packed float values in the RGB color space.
ColorTools
Contains code for manipulating colors as int and packed float values in the YCwCm color space.
FloatColors
Various utility methods for working with colors encoded as packed floats in any of the formats this can use.
GradientTools
Static methods for handling gradients of smoothly-changing colors, typically inside of FloatLists.
GradientTools
Static methods for handling gradients of smoothly-changing colors, typically inside of FloatLists.

Deprecated.
Use Interpolations from digital instead.
Interpolations.BiasGain
A wrapper around MathTools.barronSpline(float, float, float) to use it as an Interpolation.

MathTools
Deprecated.
New code should use TrigTools and MathTools.
Palette
A palette of predefined colors as packed CIELAB floats, the kind ColorTools works with.
Palette
A palette of predefined colors as packed HSLuv floats, the kind ColorTools works with.
Palette
A palette of predefined colors as packed IPT floats, the kind ColorTools works with.

A palette of predefined colors as packed IPT floats, the kind ColorTools works with.
Palette
A palette of predefined colors as packed Oklab floats, the kind ColorTools works with.
Palette
A palette of predefined colors as packed RGB(A) floats, the kind ColorTools works with.
Palette
A palette of predefined colors as packed YCwCm floats, the kind FloatColors works with.
SimplePalette
A palette of predefined colors as packed CIELAB floats, the kind ColorTools works with, plus a way to describe colors by combinations and adjustments.
SimplePalette
A palette of predefined colors as packed HSLuv floats, the kind ColorTools works with, plus a way to describe colors by combinations and adjustments.
